creator: zsndevstudio
descriptionHtml:
Ready to achieve your fitness goals? Improve your health and get in great shape with Easy Walking, a simple and funny step counting app. Do you want to count the calories you have burnt or the distance you have covered? Start today and track all your walking activities, including steps, distance, calories burned and exercise time.

WHO IS THIS PEDOMETER FOR?
The Easy Walking app has been developed specifically for people who care about their health and want to slim down and get in shape but don’t have enough time to go to the gym. It's also for those who want to change their lives and pay more attention to their health. Set daily steps goal to make a good start, and improve your lifestyle by walking every day.

【Power Saving Pedometer】
Easy Walking counts your daily steps with the built-in sensor, which greatly saves battery without GPS tracking. It records steps accurately even when the screen is locked, whether your phone is in your hand, your pocket, your bag, or your armband.

【Easy to Use Step Tracker】
No locked features. No login required. You can freely use all features without login. It auto records your steps. Pause, resume steps counting, reset steps to count from 0 if you want. Once you pause it, background data refreshing will stop. You will get your daily steps report on time, you can also check your real-time steps in the notification bar.

【Get Motivated by Setting Goals】
You can set a daily walking goal. Continuing to achieve your goals will keep you motivated. If you want to lose weight and keep fit, Easy Walking is the perfect app to stay healthy.

【Fashion & Simple Design】
Com clean, simple, and fashion design, Easy Walking will bring excellent user experience for you.

【Important Notes】
* To ensure accurate step counting, make sure the information you entered on the settings page is correct.
* You can adjust the sensitivity level of the step tracker for more accurate step counting.
* Some devices may stop counting when the screen is locked due to their power saving processing.
* Devices with older version can’t count steps with locked screen.

【Attention】
Easy Walking is intended to track or encourage general health, healthy activity, and health choices, which, as part of a healthy lifestyle may help living well with certain chronic diseases or conditions. Easy Walking is not intended for use in the diagnosis of acute or chronic disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of acute or chronic disease or other conditions. You should seek medical advice from a physician before starting any new lifestyle or fitness regimen.

DOWNLOAD NOW > AND GET STARTED!
What are you waiting for? Download the app now, set your goals and take your fitness to the next level!
descriptionShort: Get health and fun by taking steps with Easy Walking, a daily step tracker

Start today and track all your walking activities, including steps, distance, calories burned and exercise time.

WHO IS THIS PEDOMETER FOR?
The Easy Walking app has been developed specifically for people who care about their health and want to slim down and get in shape but don’t have enough time to go to the gym. It's also for those who want to change their lives and pay more attention to their health. Set daily steps goal to make a good start, and improve your lifestyle by walking every day.

【Power Saving Pedometer】
Easy Walking counts your daily steps with the built-in sensor, which greatly saves battery without GPS tracking. It records steps accurately even when the screen is locked, whether your phone is in your hand, your pocket, your bag, or your armband.

【Easy to Use Step Tracker】
No locked features. No login required. You can freely use all features without login. It auto records your steps. Pause, resume steps counting, reset steps to count from 0 if you want. Once you pause it, background data refreshing will stop. You will get your daily steps report on time, you can also check your real-time steps in the notification bar.

【Get Motivated by Setting Goals】
You can set a daily walking goal. Continuing to achieve your goals will keep you motivated.
If you want to lose weight and keep fit, Easy Walking is the perfect app to stay healthy.

【Complete Daily Tasks and Earn】
Easy Walking will reward your steps by "hard-walking". You can also get more reward by completing daily tasks, like sign in every day, or try your luck for awesome rewards playing legit instant games for free.

【Fashion & Simple Design】
Com clean, simple, and fashion design, Easy Walking will bring excellent user experience for you.

【Important Notes】
* To ensure accurate step counting, make sure the information you entered on the settings page is correct.
* You can adjust the sensitivity level of the step tracker for more accurate step counting.
* Some devices may stop counting when the screen is locked due to their power saving processing.
* Devices with older version can’t count steps with locked screen.

【Attention】
Easy Walking is intended to track or encourage general health, healthy activity, and health choices, which, as part of a healthy lifestyle may help living well with certain chronic diseases or conditions. Easy Walking is not intended for use in the diagnosis of acute or chronic disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of acute or chronic disease or other conditions. You should seek medical advice from a physician before starting any new lifestyle or fitness regimen.

DOWNLOAD NOW > AND GET STARTED!
What are you waiting for? Download the app now, set your goals and take your fitness to the next level!
